foremost.translation[0].definitions[0].e: one of the country’s foremost authorities on chemical warfare
Rostropovich was long considered the world’s foremost cellist.
foremost.translation[0].definitions[1].d: in a leading position among a group of people or things
foremost.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Sharpton was foremost among the protesters.
